data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Saskatchewan, Canada.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saskatchewan, Canada
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Saskatchewan, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 12 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Saskatchewan, Canada who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Saskatchewan, Canada.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.1% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Saskatchewan against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Saskatchewan, Canada to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Saskatchewan, Canada will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.
